info.name: Firefox Quantum (57) Safari 11 Look
info.description:
Best added to userChrome.css
Intended for use with MacOS

This does not style a site it alters the Firefox chrome.
info.additionalInfo:
Be sure to set Firefox options as follows (right click button bar and select CUSTOMIZE...)

Title Bar = unchecked
Drag Space = unchecked
Themes = Light
Density = Compact


Based on https://userstyles.org/styles/120683/safari-9-for-firefox-mac-only
Thank you for the head start.
